title: How can a female monk live her life? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the need to be a monk? What God has to do with your money and family that one needs to leave all this for spiritual pursuit. Sahaja Yoga meditation as founded by H H Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi, and practiced in over 120 countries by people of all faiths and religions, is based on a balanced approach. It focuses on householder and those live in society. Spirituality and money has no co-relation. Thats why Sahaja Yoga is absolutely FREE (www.sahajayoga.org.in) God wants to give His love. He doesnt want us to suffer in pain. There is only Joy in Kingdom of God, pain and sufferings are in our ego.

Many religions have their own pratices for female monks like Jainism,Hinduism,and others but female monks can live in their own house more comfortable if their family support her. And follow Spritual Practice.
